subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|s=谂|alt=恁}}
Probably a {{der|yue|qfa-tak}} substrate word. Compare {{cog|za|naemj||to think}}. This root occurs in several {{bor|zh|za|-}} dialects and {{bor|zh|hmx-mie|-}}.

{{zh-ref|Bai (1980)}} associates this word with {{zh-l|*恁|to think}}.

{{zh-ref|Bauer (1996)}} argues the direction of borrowing of this word is not certain, and it is just as likely that {{bor|zh|za|-}} and/or {{bor|zh|hmx-mie|-}} borrowed it from Cantonese as the other way round. This root does not seem to occur in the {{bor|zh|tbq|-}} languages.
